channel.title: Is there a way to...?
channel.description: Is there any way to add the hp prayer and run icons next to minimap and make the hp and prayer ones work. i don't care if the run does or not. but i really would like to get the hp and prayer minimap icons on the client and get them to work. Also. idk if this is server or client sided so i went with my gut and went with client. Please help.

item.title: Is there a way to...?
item.dc:creator: @Ztink Ztink
item.description:
@Ztink wrote:

dang. well if anyone knows of a tutorial for it i would really appreciate it.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 14, 2009, 05:24:51 pm[/size][hr]So no one knows of a way to do this?

Read full topic
